Tsuru Teruhito no Jissen Kabushiki Bai Bai Game
都留照人の実践株式倍バイゲーム
name: Tsuru Teruhito no Jissen Kabushiki Bi-Game
overview: Tsuru Teruhito no Jissen Kabushiki Bi-Game (or Buy Game, or Bai Game) is a PC Engine stock trading simulation game from TOSE and Intec. The player views and trades in stocks while keeping a keen eye on fluctuations and the market prices. When buying and selling, they instruct their secretary (who will change depending on the player's fortune) to make a call and buy/sell the chosen stock.
